entry.def: Chlorofluorocarbons are the same as CFCs .

means.word_mean: 1. a fluorocarbon with chlorine; formerly used as a refrigerant and as a propellant in aerosol cans;

sentences.sentence: "the chlorine in CFCs causes depletion of atmospheric ozone"
